name: Morf (ijgames)
description:
It's a physics based game with:
• unique mechanics
• minimalist design
• interesting puzzles
• simple controls
• challenging levels

During the progress you will find new interesting mechanics and face new physics challenges. So if you are a fan of clever games, this minimalist game is for you!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play?
The goal is simple - Morf (red ball) should get to the finish!
You can only control the size of the character (red ball).
It seems a hard game, but physics will help you!

You can get to the finish and pass levels in various ways.
So be creative, use gravity to your advantage, solve physics puzzles and have fun!
